                  abs PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  da02              BGE      |L1.10|
000004  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
000008  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.10|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4770              BX       lr
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  clr_scrn PROC
;;;18     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;19     void clr_scrn(void)

;;;20     {
;;;21     char i;
;;;22     for (i=0;i<LCD_SIZE;i++)

;;;24     	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';

                  |L1.22|

00001c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;22

000020  d3f9              BCC      |L1.22|
;;;25     	}
;;;26     }

;;;27

                  find PROC
;;;28     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;29     char find(char xy)

;;;30     {
;;;31     char i=0;

;;;32     do i++;

                  |L1.44|

;;;35     return i;

                  bin2bcd_int PROC
;;;39     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;40     void bin2bcd_int(unsigned int in)
00003e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;41     {
;;;42     
;;;43     char i=5;
;;;44     for(i=0;i<5;i++)

;;;45     	{
;;;46     	dig[i]=in%10;

000046  f04f020a          MOV      r2,#0xa
                  |L1.74|
00004a  4603              MOV      r3,r0
00004c  fbb0f0f2          UDIV     r0,r0,r2
000050  fb023310          MLS      r3,r2,r0,r3
000054  5463              STRB     r3,[r4,r1]

00005a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;44
00005c  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;44
00005e  d3f4              BCC      |L1.74|
;;;47     	in/=10;
;;;48     	}   
;;;49     }
000060  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;50     //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  bcd2lcd_zero PROC
;;;51     void bcd2lcd_zero(char sig)
000062  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;52     {
;;;53     char i;
;;;54     zero_on=1;
000064  4dea              LDR      r5,|L1.1040|
000066  f04f0101          MOV      r1,#1
00006a  7029              STRB     r1,[r5,#0]
;;;55     for (i=5;i>0;i--)
00006c  f04f0105          MOV      r1,#5
;;;56     	{
;;;57     	if(zero_on&&(!dig[i-1])&&(i>sig))
000070  4be6              LDR      r3,|L1.1036|
;;;58     		{
;;;59     		dig[i-1]=0x20;
000072  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
000076  f04f0700          MOV      r7,#0                 ;54
                  |L1.122|
00007a  782a              LDRB     r2,[r5,#0]            ;57  ; zero_on
00007c  b142              CBZ      r2,|L1.144|
00007e  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1              ;57
000080  f8124c01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]           ;57
000084  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.144|
000086  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;57
000088  d902              BLS      |L1.144|
00008a  f8026c01          STRB     r6,[r2,#-1]
00008e  e007              B        |L1.160|
                  |L1.144|
;;;60     		}
;;;61     	else
;;;62     		{
;;;63     		dig[i-1]=dig[i-1]+0x30;
000090  eb030201          ADD      r2,r3,r1
000094  f8124d01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]!
000098  f1040430          ADD      r4,r4,#0x30
00009c  7014              STRB     r4,[r2,#0]
;;;64     		zero_on=0;
00009e  702f              STRB     r7,[r5,#0]
                  |L1.160|
0000a0  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1              ;55
0000a4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;55
0000a6  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;55
0000a8  d1e7              BNE      |L1.122|
;;;65     		}	
;;;66     	}
;;;67     }             
0000aa  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;68     
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;69     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;70     void int2lcd_m(signed short in,char xy,char des)
0000ac  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;71     {
0000ae  460d              MOV      r5,r1
0000b0  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;72     char i;
;;;73     char n;
;;;74     char bMinus;
;;;75     bMinus=0;
;;;76     if(in<0)
0000b2  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0000b4  da04              BGE      |L1.192|
;;;77     	{
;;;78     	bMinus=1;
;;;79     	in=(~in+1);
0000b6  ea6f0000          MVN      r0,r0
0000ba  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0000be  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.192|
;;;80     	}
;;;81     bin2bcd_int(in);
0000c0  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;82     bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);

0000c6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0000c8  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;83     i=find(xy);
0000cc  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0000ce  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;84     if(i!=255)
0000d2  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
0000d4  d022              BEQ      |L1.284|
;;;85     	{
;;;86     	for (n=0;n<5;n++)
0000d6  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;87     		{ 
;;;88     		if(n<des)
;;;89     			{
;;;90     			lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
0000da  4dcc              LDR      r5,|L1.1036|
0000dc  4aca              LDR      r2,|L1.1032|
                  |L1.222|
0000de  42a1              CMP      r1,r4                 ;88
0000e0  d202              BCS      |L1.232|
0000e2  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
0000e4  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
0000e6  e011              B        |L1.268|
                  |L1.232|
;;;91     			} 
;;;92     		else if (n==des)
0000e8  d108              BNE      |L1.252|
;;;93        			{
;;;94        			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
0000ea  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
0000ee  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
;;;95        			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0000f0  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
0000f4  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
0000f6  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
0000fa  e007              B        |L1.268|
                  |L1.252|
;;;96        			} 	  
;;;97     		else if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
0000fc  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
0000fe  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000100  d004              BEQ      |L1.268|
;;;98     			{
;;;99     			if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
000102  b164              CBZ      r4,|L1.286|
;;;100    			else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
000104  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000108  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.268|
;;;101       			}
;;;102       		else if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20)&&(bMinus))
;;;103    	   		{
;;;104    			if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]='-';	
;;;105    			else lcd_buffer[i-1]='-';
;;;106    			n=5;
;;;107       			}	   
;;;108    		i--;	
00010c  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000110  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000112  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;86
000116  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;86
000118  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;86
00011a  d3e0              BCC      |L1.222|
                  |L1.284|
;;;109    		}
;;;110    	}
;;;111    }
00011c  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.286|
00011e  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]            ;99
000120  e7f4              B        |L1.268|
;;;112    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;113    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;114    void int2lcd_mm(signed short in,char xy,char des)

;;;115    {

;;;128    for (n=0;n<5;n++)

;;;129    	{
;;;130       	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))

;;;131       		{
;;;132       		if((dig[n+1]==' ')&&(minus=='-'))lcd_buffer[i-1]='-';

                  |L1.370|
;;;134       		}
;;;135       	else 
;;;136       		{
;;;137       		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];

000178  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]

;;;141       			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];

;;;142       			} 
;;;143       		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];

                  |L1.416|
;;;144       		else if ((minus=='-')&&(n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')&&(dig[n+1]==' ')) lcd_buffer[i]='-';

                  |L1.418|
;;;145       		}  
;;;146    		
;;;147    	i--;

                  int2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;151    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;152    void int2lcd_mmm(signed short in,char xy,char des)
0001b4  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
;;;153    {
0001b6  4603              MOV      r3,r0
;;;154    signed char i;
;;;155    char n;
;;;156    char s[10];
;;;157    char minus='+';
0001b8  f04f072b          MOV      r7,#0x2b
;;;158    char zero_on;
;;;159    char simb_num;
;;;160    
;;;161    if(in<0)
0001bc  2b00              CMP      r3,#0
0001be  da04              BGE      |L1.458|
;;;162    	{
;;;163    	in=-in;
0001c0  f1c30000          RSB      r0,r3,#0
0001c4  b203              SXTH     r3,r0
;;;164    	minus='-';
0001c6  f04f072d          MOV      r7,#0x2d
                  |L1.458|
;;;165    	}
;;;166    
;;;167    for(i=0;i<10;i++)

;;;168    	{
;;;169    	s[i]=in%10;
0001ce  f04f040a          MOV      r4,#0xa
0001d2  466d              MOV      r5,sp                 ;156
                  |L1.468|
0001d4  fb93f6f4          SDIV     r6,r3,r4
0001d8  fb043316          MLS      r3,r4,r6,r3
0001dc  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;170    	in/=10;
0001de  b233              SXTH     r3,r6
0001e0  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;167
0001e4  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;167
0001e6  280a              CMP      r0,#0xa               ;167
0001e8  dbf4              BLT      |L1.468|
;;;171    	}   
;;;172    
;;;173    zero_on=1;
0001ea  f04f0301          MOV      r3,#1
;;;174    simb_num=0;
0001ee  f04f0400          MOV      r4,#0
;;;175    
;;;176    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)
0001f2  f04f0009          MOV      r0,#9
;;;177    	{
;;;178    	if(zero_on&&(!s[i])&&(i>(des)))
;;;179    	     {
;;;180    	     s[i]=0x20;
0001f6  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
                  |L1.506|
0001fa  b143              CBZ      r3,|L1.526|

000200  f1bc0f00          CMP      r12,#0                ;178
000204  d103              BNE      |L1.526|
000206  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;178
000208  dd01              BLE      |L1.526|
00020a  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
00020c  e008              B        |L1.544|
                  |L1.526|
;;;181    	     }
;;;182    	else 
;;;183    	     {
;;;184    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;
00020e  5c2b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r0]
000210  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30
000214  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;185    	     zero_on=0;
000216  f04f0300          MOV      r3,#0
;;;186    	     simb_num++;
00021a  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
00021e  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.544|
000220  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;176
000224  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;176
000226  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;176
000228  dae7              BGE      |L1.506|
;;;187    	     }
;;;188    	 }
;;;189    	          
;;;190    if(minus=='-')	
00022a  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
00022c  d104              BNE      |L1.568|
;;;191         {
;;;192         s[simb_num++]=minus; 
00022e  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000230  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
000234  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000236  542f              STRB     r7,[r5,r0]
                  |L1.568|
;;;193         }    
;;;194    if(des)
000238  b18a              CBZ      r2,|L1.606|
;;;195         {
;;;196         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)

00023c  e007              B        |L1.590|
                  |L1.574|
;;;197              {
;;;198              s[i]=s[i-1];

000246  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
000248  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;196
00024c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;196
                  |L1.590|

;;;199              }
;;;200         s[des]='.';
000252  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
000256  54a8              STRB     r0,[r5,r2]
;;;201         simb_num++;     
000258  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
00025c  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.606|
;;;202         }
;;;203    	
;;;204    n=find(xy);
00025e  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000260  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;205    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
000264  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;206    	{
;;;207         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];

00026a  e006              B        |L1.634|
                  |L1.620|
00026c  eba00601          SUB      r6,r0,r1
000270  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]

000278  b249              SXTB     r1,r1                 ;205
                  |L1.634|

00027c  dbf6              BLT      |L1.620|
;;;208    	}
;;;209    }
00027e  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;210    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;211    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;212    void long2lcd_mmm(signed long in,char xy,char des)
000280  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
;;;213    {
000282  4603              MOV      r3,r0
;;;214    signed char i;
;;;215    char n;
;;;216    char s[10];
;;;217    char minus='+';
000284  f04f072b          MOV      r7,#0x2b
;;;218    char zero_on;
;;;219    char simb_num;
;;;220    
;;;221    if(in<0)
000288  2b00              CMP      r3,#0
00028a  da03              BGE      |L1.660|
;;;222    	{
;;;223    	in=-in;
00028c  f1c30300          RSB      r3,r3,#0
;;;224    	minus='-';
000290  f04f072d          MOV      r7,#0x2d
                  |L1.660|
;;;225    	}
;;;226    
;;;227    for(i=0;i<10;i++)
000294  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;228    	{
;;;229    	s[i]=in%10;
000298  f04f040a          MOV      r4,#0xa
00029c  466d              MOV      r5,sp                 ;216
                  |L1.670|
00029e  461e              MOV      r6,r3
0002a0  fb93f3f4          SDIV     r3,r3,r4
0002a4  fb046613          MLS      r6,r4,r3,r6
0002a8  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
0002aa  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;227
0002ae  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;227
0002b0  280a              CMP      r0,#0xa               ;227
0002b2  dbf4              BLT      |L1.670|
;;;230    	in/=10;
;;;231    	}   
;;;232    
;;;233    zero_on=1;
0002b4  f04f0301          MOV      r3,#1
;;;234    simb_num=0;
0002b8  f04f0400          MOV      r4,#0
;;;235    
;;;236    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)
0002bc  f04f0009          MOV      r0,#9
;;;237    	{
;;;238    	if(zero_on&&(!s[i])&&(i>(des)))
;;;239    	     {
;;;240    	     s[i]=0x20;
0002c0  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
                  |L1.708|
0002c4  b143              CBZ      r3,|L1.728|
0002c6  f815c000          LDRB     r12,[r5,r0]           ;238
0002ca  f1bc0f00          CMP      r12,#0                ;238
0002ce  d103              BNE      |L1.728|
0002d0  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;238
0002d2  dd01              BLE      |L1.728|
0002d4  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
0002d6  e008              B        |L1.746|
                  |L1.728|
;;;241    	     }
;;;242    	else 
;;;243    	     {
;;;244    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;
0002d8  5c2b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0002da  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30
0002de  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;245    	     zero_on=0;
0002e0  f04f0300          MOV      r3,#0
;;;246    	     simb_num++;
0002e4  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0002e8  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.746|
0002ea  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;236
0002ee  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;236
0002f0  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;236
0002f2  dae7              BGE      |L1.708|
;;;247    	     }
;;;248    	 }
;;;249    	          
;;;250    if(minus=='-')	
0002f4  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
0002f6  d104              BNE      |L1.770|
;;;251         {
;;;252         s[simb_num++]=minus; 
0002f8  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0002fa  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0002fe  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000300  542f              STRB     r7,[r5,r0]
                  |L1.770|
;;;253         }    
;;;254    if(des)
000302  b18a              CBZ      r2,|L1.808|
;;;255         {
;;;256         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
000304  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
000306  e007              B        |L1.792|
                  |L1.776|
;;;257              {
;;;258              s[i]=s[i-1];
000308  eb050300          ADD      r3,r5,r0
00030c  f8133c01          LDRB     r3,[r3,#-1]
000310  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
000312  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;256
000316  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;256
                  |L1.792|
000318  4290              CMP      r0,r2                 ;256
00031a  dcf5              BGT      |L1.776|
;;;259              }
;;;260         s[des]='.';
00031c  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
000320  54a8              STRB     r0,[r5,r2]
;;;261         simb_num++;     
000322  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
000326  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.808|
;;;262         }
;;;263    	
;;;264    n=find(xy);
000328  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00032a  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;265    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
00032e  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;266    	{
;;;267         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
000332  4a35              LDR      r2,|L1.1032|
000334  e006              B        |L1.836|
                  |L1.822|
000336  eba00601          SUB      r6,r0,r1
00033a  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00033c  5593              STRB     r3,[r2,r6]
00033e  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;265
000342  b249              SXTB     r1,r1                 ;265
                  |L1.836|
000344  42a1              CMP      r1,r4                 ;265
000346  dbf6              BLT      |L1.822|
;;;268    	}
;;;269    }
000348  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;270    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdyx_mmm PROC
;;;271    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;272    void long2lcdyx_mmm(signed long in,char y,char x,char des)
00034a  e92d41fe          PUSH     {r1-r8,lr}
;;;273    {
;;;274    signed char i;
;;;275    char n;
;;;276    char s[10];
;;;277    char minus='+';
00034e  f04f0c2b          MOV      r12,#0x2b
;;;278    char zero_on;
;;;279    char simb_num;
;;;280    
;;;281    if(in<0)
000352  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000354  da03              BGE      |L1.862|
;;;282    	{
;;;283    	in=-in;
000356  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
;;;284    	minus='-';
00035a  f04f0c2d          MOV      r12,#0x2d
                  |L1.862|
;;;285    	}
;;;286    
;;;287    for(i=0;i<10;i++)
00035e  f04f0400          MOV      r4,#0
;;;288    	{
;;;289    	s[i]=in%10;
000362  f04f050a          MOV      r5,#0xa
000366  466f              MOV      r7,sp                 ;276
                  |L1.872|
000368  4606              MOV      r6,r0
00036a  fb90f0f5          SDIV     r0,r0,r5
00036e  fb056610          MLS      r6,r5,r0,r6
000372  553e              STRB     r6,[r7,r4]
000374  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1              ;287
000378  b264              SXTB     r4,r4                 ;287
00037a  2c0a              CMP      r4,#0xa               ;287
00037c  dbf4              BLT      |L1.872|
;;;290    	in/=10;
;;;291    	}   
;;;292    
;;;293    zero_on=1;
00037e  f04f0501          MOV      r5,#1
;;;294    simb_num=0;
000382  f04f0400          MOV      r4,#0
;;;295    
;;;296    for (i=9;i>=0;i--)
000386  f04f0009          MOV      r0,#9
;;;297    	{
;;;298    	if(zero_on&&(!s[i])&&(i>(des)))
;;;299    	     {
;;;300    	     s[i]=0x20;
00038a  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
                  |L1.910|
00038e  b145              CBZ      r5,|L1.930|
000390  f8178000          LDRB     r8,[r7,r0]            ;298
000394  f1b80f00          CMP      r8,#0                 ;298
000398  d103              BNE      |L1.930|
00039a  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;298
00039c  dd01              BLE      |L1.930|
00039e  543e              STRB     r6,[r7,r0]
0003a0  e008              B        |L1.948|
                  |L1.930|
;;;301    	     }
;;;302    	else 
;;;303    	     {
;;;304    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;
0003a2  5c3d              LDRB     r5,[r7,r0]
0003a4  f1050530          ADD      r5,r5,#0x30
0003a8  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
;;;305    	     zero_on=0;
0003aa  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
;;;306    	     simb_num++;
0003ae  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0003b2  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.948|
0003b4  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;296
0003b8  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;296
0003ba  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;296
0003bc  dae7              BGE      |L1.910|
;;;307    	     }
;;;308    	 }
;;;309    	          
;;;310    if(minus=='-')	
0003be  f1bc0f2d          CMP      r12,#0x2d
0003c2  d105              BNE      |L1.976|
;;;311         {
;;;312         s[simb_num++]=minus; 
0003c4  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0003c6  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0003ca  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
0003cc  f807c000          STRB     r12,[r7,r0]
                  |L1.976|
;;;313         }    
;;;314    if(des)
0003d0  b18b              CBZ      r3,|L1.1014|
;;;315         {
;;;316         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)
0003d2  b260              SXTB     r0,r4
0003d4  e007              B        |L1.998|
                  |L1.982|
;;;317              {
;;;318              s[i]=s[i-1];
0003d6  eb070500          ADD      r5,r7,r0
0003da  f8155c01          LDRB     r5,[r5,#-1]
0003de  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
0003e0  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1              ;316
0003e4  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;316
                  |L1.998|
0003e6  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;316
0003e8  dcf5              BGT      |L1.982|
;;;319              }
;;;320         s[des]='.';
0003ea  f04f002e          MOV      r0,#0x2e
0003ee  54f8              STRB     r0,[r7,r3]
;;;321         simb_num++;     
0003f0  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
0003f4  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.1014|
;;;322         }
;;;323    	
;;;324    n=(20*y)+x;
0003f6  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0003fa  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0003fe  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;325    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
000400  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;326    	{
;;;327         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
000404  4a00              LDR      r2,|L1.1032|
000406  e00c              B        |L1.1058|
                  |L1.1032|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.1036|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L1.1040|
                          DCD      zero_on
                  |L1.1044|
000414  eba10500          SUB      r5,r1,r0
000418  5c3b              LDRB     r3,[r7,r0]
00041a  5553              STRB     r3,[r2,r5]
00041c  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;325
000420  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;325
                  |L1.1058|
000422  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;325
000424  dbf6              BLT      |L1.1044|
;;;328    	}
;;;329    
;;;330    
;;;331    
;;;332    }
000426  e8bd81fe          POP      {r1-r8,pc}
;;;333    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdyx PROC
;;;334    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;335    void int2lcdyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x,char des)
00042a  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;336    {
00042c  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00042e  4616              MOV      r6,r2
000430  461c              MOV      r4,r3
;;;337    char i;
;;;338    char n;
;;;339    bin2bcd_int(in);
000432  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;340    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
000436  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000438  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00043a  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;341    i=(y*20)+x;
00043e  eb050085          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSL #2
000442  eb060080          ADD      r0,r6,r0,LSL #2
000446  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;342    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
000448  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;343    	{ 
;;;344    	if(n<des)
;;;345    		{
;;;346    		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
00044c  4bfe              LDR      r3,|L1.2120|
00044e  4dff              LDR      r5,|L1.2124|
                  |L1.1104|
000450  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;344
000452  d201              BCS      |L1.1112|
000454  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
000456  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.1112|
;;;347    		}   
;;;348    	if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
000458  d307              BCC      |L1.1130|
00045a  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
00045c  2a20              CMP      r2,#0x20
00045e  d004              BEQ      |L1.1130|
;;;349    		{
;;;350    		if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
000460  b164              CBZ      r4,|L1.1148|
;;;351    		else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
000462  eb050601          ADD      r6,r5,r1
000466  f8062c01          STRB     r2,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.1130|
;;;352       		}   
;;;353    	i--;	
00046a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00046e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
000470  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;342
000474  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;342
000476  2805              CMP      r0,#5                 ;342
000478  d3ea              BCC      |L1.1104|
;;;354    	}
;;;355    }
00047a  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.1148|
00047c  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]            ;350
00047e  e7f4              B        |L1.1130|
;;;356    
                          ENDP

                  sub_bgnd PROC
;;;1503   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1504   void sub_bgnd(char const *adr,char xy,signed char offset)
000480  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1505   {
000482  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000484  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000486  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;1506   char temp;
;;;1507   temp=find(xy);
000488  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1508   
;;;1509   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1510   if(temp!=255)
00048c  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
00048e  d00c              BEQ      |L1.1194|
;;;1511   while (*adr)
;;;1512   	{
;;;1513   	lcd_buffer[temp+offset]=*adr++;
000490  4aee              LDR      r2,|L1.2124|
;;;1514   	temp++;
000492  e007              B        |L1.1188|
                  |L1.1172|
000494  eb000305          ADD      r3,r0,r5              ;1513
000498  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1              ;1513
00049c  54d1              STRB     r1,[r2,r3]            ;1513
00049e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
0004a2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.1188|
0004a4  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1511
0004a6  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1511
0004a8  d1f4              BNE      |L1.1172|
                  |L1.1194|
;;;1515       	}
;;;1516   }
0004aa  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1517   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd PROC
;;;1307   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1308   void int2lcd(unsigned short in,char xy,char des)
0004ac  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1309   {
0004ae  460d              MOV      r5,r1
0004b0  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;1310   char i;
;;;1311   char n;
;;;1312   
;;;1313   bin2bcd_int(in);
0004b2  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;1314   bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
0004b6  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
0004b8  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0004ba  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;1315   i=find(xy);
0004be  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0004c0  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1316   for (n=0;n<5;n++)
0004c4  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
;;;1317   	{
;;;1318      	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
0004c8  4adf              LDR      r2,|L1.2120|
;;;1319      		{
;;;1320      		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
0004ca  4de0              LDR      r5,|L1.2124|
                  |L1.1228|
0004cc  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.1240|
0004ce  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]            ;1318
0004d0  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20              ;1318
0004d2  d001              BEQ      |L1.1240|
0004d4  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0004d6  e015              B        |L1.1284|
                  |L1.1240|
;;;1321      		}
;;;1322      	else 
;;;1323      		{
;;;1324      		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
0004d8  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
0004da  d202              BCS      |L1.1250|
0004dc  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0004de  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
0004e0  e010              B        |L1.1284|
                  |L1.1250|
;;;1325      		else if (n==des)
0004e2  d108              BNE      |L1.1270|
;;;1326      			{
;;;1327      			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
0004e4  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
0004e8  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;1328      			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0004ea  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
0004ee  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0004f0  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
0004f4  e006              B        |L1.1284|
                  |L1.1270|
;;;1329      			} 
;;;1330      		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];   		
0004f6  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
0004f8  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
0004fa  d003              BEQ      |L1.1284|
0004fc  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
000500  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.1284|
;;;1331      		}  
;;;1332   		
;;;1333   	i--;	
000504  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000508  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00050a  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;1316
00050e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1316
000510  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;1316
000512  d3db              BCC      |L1.1228|
;;;1334   	}
;;;1335   }
000514  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1336   
                          ENDP

                  ptr_carry PROC
;;;1545   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1546   char ptr_carry(signed int in,unsigned char modul,signed int carry)
000516  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
;;;1547   {
;;;1548   signed int tempSI;
;;;1549   tempSI=in;                                                             
;;;1550   tempSI+=carry;
;;;1551   if(tempSI<0)tempSI+=modul;
000518  2800              CMP      r0,#0
00051a  da01              BGE      |L1.1312|
00051c  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
00051e  e003              B        |L1.1320|
                  |L1.1312|
;;;1552   else if(tempSI>=modul)tempSI-=modul;
000520  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000522  db01              BLT      |L1.1320|
000524  eba00001          SUB      r0,r0,r1
                  |L1.1320|
;;;1553   
;;;1554   return (char)tempSI;
000528  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1555   }
00052a  4770              BX       lr
;;;1556   
                          ENDP

                  event2ind PROC
;;;358    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;359    void event2ind(char num, char simbol)
00052c  e92d4ffe          PUSH     {r1-r11,lr}
;;;360    {
000530  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000532  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;361    char iii;
;;;362    char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;363    unsigned int tempii;    
;;;364    		
;;;365    tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
000534  f44f6060          MOV      r0,#0xe00
000538  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
;;;366    tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));
00053c  4262              RSBS     r2,r4,#0
00053e  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
000540  f7fffffe          BL       ptr_carry
;;;367    tempii*=32;
000544  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;368    tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
000548  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
00054c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;369         
;;;370    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
00054e  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
000550  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000552  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;371    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
000556  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000558  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
00055c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;372    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
000560  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000562  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
000566  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;373    
;;;374    iii=find(simbol);
00056a  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00056c  f7fffffe          BL       find

;;;1163      	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0006c8  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0006cc  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0006ce  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]
;;;1164      	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
0006d2  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]
;;;1165      	 	    int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
0006d6  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
0006da  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
0006de  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
0006e2  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1166      	 		int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
0006e6  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
0006ea  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0006ec  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
0006ee  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1167      	 		int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
0006f2  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]
0006f6  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0006f8  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
0006fa  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
                  |L1.1790|
;;;1168       		}	                   
;;;1169       	else      	
;;;1170       		{
;;;1171       		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;1172       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;1173       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;1174       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;1175       		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;1176       		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;1177       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;1178       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;1179       		int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;1180       		int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;1181       		if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;1182   			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;1183       		}
;;;1184   		}		 
;;;1185       }			   
;;;1186   }

001cc2  48f9              LDR      r0,|L1.8360|
001cc4  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1052
001cc6  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;1052
001cca  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1052
001ccc  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001cd0  e575              B        |L1.6078|
                  |L1.7378|
001cd2  f89d000a          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0xa]          ;1059
001cd6  285a              CMP      r0,#0x5a              ;1059
001cd8  d1b4              BNE      |L1.7236|
001cda  f10a0001          ADD      r0,r10,#1             ;1061
001cde  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1061
001ce0  f80b300a          STRB     r3,[r11,r10]          ;1061
001ce4  f04f0af0          MOV      r10,#0xf0             ;1062
001ce8  f1000c01          ADD      r12,r0,#1             ;1062
001cec  f00c0cff          AND      r12,r12,#0xff         ;1062
001cf0  f80ba000          STRB     r10,[r11,r0]          ;1062
001cf4  f04f00e0          MOV      r0,#0xe0              ;1063
001cf8  f10c0301          ADD      r3,r12,#1             ;1063
001cfc  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3                 ;1063
001cfe  f80b000c          STRB     r0,[r11,r12]          ;1063
001d02  f1030c01          ADD      r12,r3,#1             ;1064
001d06  f00c0cff          AND      r12,r12,#0xff         ;1064
001d0a  f80b2003          STRB     r2,[r11,r3]           ;1064
001d0e  f04f03ed          MOV      r3,#0xed              ;1065
001d12  f10c0201          ADD      r2,r12,#1             ;1065
001d16  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2                 ;1065
001d18  f80b300c          STRB     r3,[r11,r12]          ;1065
001d1c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e              ;1066

001d24  f00c0cff          AND      r12,r12,#0xff         ;1066
001d28  f80b3002          STRB     r3,[r11,r2]           ;1066
001d2c  f10c0201          ADD      r2,r12,#1             ;1067
001d30  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2                 ;1067
001d32  f80b100c          STRB     r1,[r11,r12]          ;1067
001d36  f1020101          ADD      r1,r2,#1              ;1068
001d3a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1068
001d3c  f80b0002          STRB     r0,[r11,r2]           ;1068
001d40  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1069
001d44  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1069
001d46  f80ba001          STRB     r10,[r11,r1]          ;1069
001d4a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1070
001d4e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1070
001d50  f80b3000          STRB     r3,[r11,r0]           ;1070
001d54  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1086
001d58  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1086
001d5a  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1086
001d5e  f89d1004          LDRB     r1,[sp,#4]            ;1091
001d62  f8b9203c          LDRH     r2,[r9,#0x3c]         ;1091
001d66  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;1091
001d68  d147              BNE      |L1.7674|
001d6a  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1091
001d6e  f8992038          LDRB     r2,[r9,#0x38]         ;1091
001d72  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;1091
001d74  d141              BNE      |L1.7674|
001d76  f89d1006          LDRB     r1,[sp,#6]            ;1091
001d7a  f899202c          LDRB     r2,[r9,#0x2c]         ;1091
001d7e  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;1091
001d80  d13b              BNE      |L1.7674|
001d82  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1093
001d86  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1093
001d88  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1093
001d8c  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1094
001d90  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1094
001d92  f80b8001          STRB     r8,[r11,r1]           ;1094
001d96  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a              ;1095
001d9a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1095
001d9e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1095
001da0  f80b2000          STRB     r2,[r11,r0]           ;1095
001da4  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1096
001da8  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1096
001daa  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1096
001dae  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1097
001db2  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1097
001db4  f80b7000          STRB     r7,[r11,r0]           ;1097
001db8  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1098
001dbc  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1098
001dbe  f80b2001          STRB     r2,[r11,r1]           ;1098
001dc2  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1099
001dc6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1099
001dc8  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1099
001dcc  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]           ;1100
001dd0  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]            ;1101
001dd4  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1101
001dd8  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1101
001ddc  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001de0  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]            ;1102
001de4  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1102
001de6  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1102
001de8  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001dec  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]            ;1103
001df0  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1103
001df2  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1103
001df4  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001df8  e4e1              B        |L1.6078|
                  |L1.7674|
001dfa  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1107
001dfe  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1107
001e00  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1107
001e04  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1108
001e08  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0                 ;1108
001e0a  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1108
001e0e  f1020001          ADD      r0,r2,#1              ;1109
001e12  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1109
001e14  f80b8002          STRB     r8,[r11,r2]           ;1109
001e18  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1110
001e1c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1110
001e1e  f80b7000          STRB     r7,[r11,r0]           ;1110
001e22  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1111
001e26  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1111
001e28  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1111
001e2c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1112
001e30  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1112
001e32  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1112
001e36  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1113
001e3a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1113
001e3c  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1113
001e40  f80b5000          STRB     r5,[r11,r0]           ;1114
001e44  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;1115
001e48  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1115
001e4c  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1115
001e50  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd

001e58  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1116
001e5a  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1116
001e5c  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001e60  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1117
001e64  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;1117
001e66  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;1117
001e68  d303              BCC      |L1.7794|
001e6a  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;1117
001e6e  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1117
                  |L1.7794|
001e72  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1118
001e76  488c              LDR      r0,|L1.8360|
001e78  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1118
001e7a  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;1118
001e7e  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1118
001e80  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001e84  e49b              B        |L1.6078|
                  |L1.7814|
001e86  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1171
001e8a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1171
001e8c  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1171
001e90  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1172
001e94  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1172
001e96  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1172
001e9a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1173
001e9e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1173
001ea0  f80b8000          STRB     r8,[r11,r0]           ;1173
001ea4  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1174
001ea8  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1174
001eaa  f80b7001          STRB     r7,[r11,r1]           ;1174
001eae  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1175
001eb2  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1175
001eb4  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1175
001eb8  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1176
001ebc  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1176
001ebe  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1176
001ec2  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1177
001ec6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1177
001ec8  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1177

001ed0  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;1179
001ed4  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1179
001ed8  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1179
001edc  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001ee0  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;1180
001ee4  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1180
001ee6  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1180
001ee8  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd

                  |L1.7934|

001f02  4869              LDR      r0,|L1.8360|

001f0a  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1182
001f0c  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001f10  e455              B        |L1.6078|
;;;1187   
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;1188   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1189   void community2lcd(char* in,
001f12  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1190   			char xy,
;;;1191   			char flash_pos,
;;;1192   			char flash_on)
;;;1193   {
001f14  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001f16  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001f18  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001f1a  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1194   char temp;
;;;1195   char i;
;;;1196   //char n;
;;;1197   
;;;1198   
;;;1199   i=find(xy);
001f1c  f7fffffe          BL       find
001f20  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;1200   
;;;1201   //in1=192;
;;;1202   
;;;1203   //in2=34;
;;;1204   
;;;1205   
;;;1206   
;;;1207   temp=i;
001f22  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;1208   
;;;1209   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1210   if(temp!=255)
;;;1211   while (*in)
;;;1212   	{
;;;1213   	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
001f24  4d61              LDR      r5,|L1.8364|
001f26  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;1210
001f28  d106              BNE      |L1.7992|
001f2a  e008              B        |L1.7998|
                  |L1.7980|
001f2c  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
001f2e  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;1214   	temp++;
001f32  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001f36  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.7992|
001f38  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1211
001f3a  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1211
001f3c  d1f6              BNE      |L1.7980|
                  |L1.7998|
;;;1215       	}
;;;1216   
;;;1217   
;;;1218   
;;;1219   if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
001f3e  485c              LDR      r0,|L1.8368|
001f40  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
001f42  2800              CMP      r0,#0
001f44  d006              BEQ      |L1.8020|
001f46  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
001f48  d004              BEQ      |L1.8020|
;;;1220   	{
;;;1221   	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
001f4a  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
001f4e  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
001f52  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.8020|
;;;1222   	}
;;;1223   
;;;1224   }
001f54  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1225   
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;1226   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1227   void ip2lcd(	short in1,
001f56  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;1228   			short in2,
;;;1229   			short in3,
;;;1230   			short in4,
;;;1231   			char xy,
;;;1232   			char flash_pos)
;;;1233   {
001f5a  4607              MOV      r7,r0
001f5c  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
001f60  4688              MOV      r8,r1
001f62  4691              MOV      r9,r2
001f64  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;1234   char i;
;;;1235   //char n;
;;;1236   
;;;1237   //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;1238   //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;1239   i=find(xy);
001f66  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1240   
;;;1241   //in1=192;
;;;1242   
;;;1243   //in2=34;
;;;1244   
;;;1245   if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
001f6a  4b51              LDR      r3,|L1.8368|
;;;1246   	{
;;;1247   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
001f6c  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
001f6e  4c4f              LDR      r4,|L1.8364|
;;;1248   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;1249   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;1250   	}
;;;1251   else 
;;;1252   	{
;;;1253   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
001f70  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;1254   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;1255   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
001f72  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
001f76  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;1245
001f78  d109              BNE      |L1.8078|
001f7a  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;1245  ; bFL2
001f7c  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.8078|
001f7e  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1247
001f82  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;1247
001f86  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;1247
001f88  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;1248
001f8a  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;1249
001f8c  e017              B        |L1.8126|
                  |L1.8078|
001f8e  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;1253
001f92  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;1253
001f96  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1253
001f9a  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;1253
001f9e  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;1253
001fa2  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;1254
001fa6  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;1254
001faa  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;1254
001fae  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;1254
001fb2  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
001fb6  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001fba  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.8126|
;;;1256   	}
;;;1257   
;;;1258   if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
001fbe  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
001fc0  d109              BNE      |L1.8150|
001fc2  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001fc4  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.8150|
;;;1259   	{
;;;1260   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
001fc6  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001fca  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001fce  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1261   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
001fd0  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1262   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
001fd2  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001fd4  e017              B        |L1.8198|
                  |L1.8150|
;;;1263   	}
;;;1264   else 
;;;1265   	{
;;;1266   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
001fd6  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
001fda  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
001fde  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001fe2  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001fe6  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
001fea  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;1267   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
001fee  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
001ff2  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
001ff6  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001ffa  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1268   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
001ffc  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
002000  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
002004  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.8198|
;;;1269   	}
;;;1270   
;;;1271   if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
002006  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
002008  d109              BNE      |L1.8222|
00200a  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
00200c  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.8222|
;;;1272   	{
;;;1273   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
00200e  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
002012  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
002016  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1274   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
002018  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1275   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
00201a  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
00201c  e017              B        |L1.8270|
                  |L1.8222|
;;;1276   	}
;;;1277   else 
;;;1278   	{
;;;1279   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
00201e  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
002022  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
002026  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
00202a  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
00202e  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
002032  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1280   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
002036  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
00203a  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
00203e  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
002042  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1281   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
002044  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
002048  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
00204c  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.8270|
;;;1282   	}
;;;1283   
;;;1284   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
00204e  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
002050  d109              BNE      |L1.8294|
002052  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
002054  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.8294|
;;;1285   	{
;;;1286   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
002056  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1287   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
002058  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
00205a  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
00205e  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1288   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
002060  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.8290|
;;;1289   	}
;;;1290   else 
;;;1291   	{
;;;1292   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1293   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1294   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1295   	}
;;;1296   }
002062  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.8294|
002066  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1292
00206a  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1292
00206e  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30           ;1292
002072  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1292
002074  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1293
002078  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1293
00207c  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1293
00207e  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1293
002082  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1293
002086  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1293
002088  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1294
00208c  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1294
002090  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1294
002092  e7e6              B        |L1.8290|
;;;1297   
                          ENDP

                  checkboxing PROC
;;;1298   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1299   void checkboxing(char xy,short in)
002094  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1300   {
002096  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;1301   char i;
;;;1302   i=find(xy);
002098  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1303   if(in)lcd_buffer[i]=3;
00209c  4903              LDR      r1,|L1.8364|
00209e  b14c              CBZ      r4,|L1.8372|
0020a0  f04f0203          MOV      r2,#3
0020a4  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
                  |L1.8358|
;;;1304   else lcd_buffer[i]=4;	 
;;;1305   }
0020a6  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L1.8360|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.8364|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.8368|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.8372|
0020b4  f04f0204          MOV      r2,#4                 ;1304
0020b8  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]            ;1304
0020ba  e7f4              B        |L1.8358|
;;;1306   
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1337   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1338   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
0020bc  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1339   {
;;;1340   char i;
;;;1341   char n;
;;;1342   
;;;1343   i=(20*y)+x;
0020be  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0020c2  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0020c6  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1344   
;;;1345   n=*((char*)&in);
0020c8  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1346   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0020cc  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
0020d0  48ff              LDR      r0,|L1.9424|
0020d2  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
0020d4  49ff              LDR      r1,|L1.9428|
0020d6  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1347   i--;
0020d8  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0020dc  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1348   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0020de  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
0020e2  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
0020e4  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1349   i--;
0020e6  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0020ea  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1350   
;;;1351   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
0020ec  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1352   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0020f0  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
0020f4  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
0020f6  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1353   i--;
0020f8  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0020fc  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1354   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0020fe  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
002102  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
002104  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1355   i--;
002106  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00210a  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1356   
;;;1357   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
00210c  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1358   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
002110  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
002114  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
002116  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1359   i--;
002118  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00211c  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1360   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
00211e  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
002122  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
002124  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1361   i--;
002126  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
00212a  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1362   
;;;1363   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
00212c  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1364   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
002130  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
002134  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
002136  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1365   i--;
002138  f1a30301          SUB      r3,r3,#1
00213c  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1366   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
00213e  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
002142  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
002144  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1367   i--;
;;;1368   }
002146  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1369   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;1370   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1371   void char2lcdh(char in,char yx)
002148  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1372   {
00214a  4604              MOV      r4,r0
00214c  4608              MOV      r0,r1
;;;1373   char i;
;;;1374   
;;;1375   i=find(yx);
00214e  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1376   
;;;1377   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
002152  4adf              LDR      r2,|L1.9424|
002154  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
002158  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
00215a  49de              LDR      r1,|L1.9428|
00215c  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
;;;1378   i--;
00215e  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
002162  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1379   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in/16];
002164  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
002168  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
00216a  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
;;;1380   i--;
;;;1381   }
00216c  e79b              B        |L1.8358|
;;;1382   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1383   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1384   void char2lcdhyx(char in,char y,char x)
00216e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1385   {
;;;1386   char i;
;;;1387   
;;;1388   i=(20*y)+x;
002170  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
002174  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
002178  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1389   
;;;1390   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
00217a  4ad5              LDR      r2,|L1.9424|
00217c  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
002180  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
002182  4bd4              LDR      r3,|L1.9428|
002184  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
;;;1391   i--;
002186  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00218a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1392   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in/16];
00218c  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
002190  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
002192  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
;;;1393   i--;
;;;1394   }
002194  e787              B        |L1.8358|
;;;1395   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1396   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1397   void int2lcdhyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x)
002196  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1398   {
;;;1399   char i;
;;;1400   
;;;1401   i=(20*y)+x;
002198  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
00219c  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
0021a0  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1402   
;;;1403   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
0021a2  4bcb              LDR      r3,|L1.9424|
0021a4  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
0021a8  4cca              LDR      r4,|L1.9428|
0021aa  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
0021ac  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1404   i--;
0021ae  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
0021b2  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;1405   in/=16;
0021b4  ea4f1210          LSR      r2,r0,#4
;;;1406   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
0021b8  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
0021bc  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
0021be  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
;;;1407   i--;
0021c0  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
0021c4  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
;;;1408   in/=16;
0021c6  ea4f1112          LSR      r1,r2,#4
;;;1409   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in%16];
0021ca  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
0021ce  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
0021d0  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1410   i--;
0021d2  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
0021d6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1411   in/=16;
0021d8  ea4f1111          LSR      r1,r1,#4
;;;1412   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[in];
0021dc  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
0021de  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1413   
;;;1414   }
0021e0  e761              B        |L1.8358|
;;;1415   
                          ENDP

                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;1416   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1417   void char2lcdbyx(char in,char y,char x)
0021e2  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1418   {
;;;1419   char i;
;;;1420   
;;;1421   i=(20*y)+x;
0021e4  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
0021e8  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
0021ec  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
;;;1422   
;;;1423   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
0021ee  49b8              LDR      r1,|L1.9424|
0021f0  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
0021f4  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
0021f6  f1a40201          SUB      r2,r4,#1
0021fa  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
0021fc  4ab5              LDR      r2,|L1.9428|
0021fe  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
;;;1424   in/=2;
002200  ea4f0450          LSR      r4,r0,#1
;;;1425   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
002204  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
002208  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00220a  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
00220e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002210  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
;;;1426   in/=2;
002212  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
;;;1427   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
002216  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00221a  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00221c  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
002220  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
002222  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
;;;1428   in/=2;
002224  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
;;;1429   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
002228  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00222c  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00222e  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
002232  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002234  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
;;;1430   in/=2;
002236  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
;;;1431   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
00223a  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00223e  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
002240  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
002244  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
002246  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
;;;1432   in/=2;
002248  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
;;;1433   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
00224c  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
002250  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
002252  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
002256  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002258  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
;;;1434   in/=2;
00225a  ea4f0354          LSR      r3,r4,#1
;;;1435   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
00225e  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
002262  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
002264  f1a00401          SUB      r4,r0,#1
002268  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
00226a  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
;;;1436   in/=2;
00226c  ea4f0053          LSR      r0,r3,#1
;;;1437   lcd_buffer[i--]=ABCDEF[in%2];
002270  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
002272  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
;;;1438   in/=2;
;;;1439   }
002274  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1440   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1441   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1442   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
002276  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1443   {
;;;1444   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
002278  4997              LDR      r1,|L1.9432|
00227a  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
00227c  4b95              LDR      r3,|L1.9428|
00227e  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
002282  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
002286  428a              CMP      r2,r1
002288  d104              BNE      |L1.8852|
00228a  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
00228e  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1445   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1446   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1447   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1448   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1449   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1450   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1451   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1452   }
002292  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8852|
002294  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1445
002296  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1445
002298  d106              BNE      |L1.8872|
00229a  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1445
00229e  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1445
0022a2  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1445
0022a6  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8872|
0022a8  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1446
0022aa  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1446
0022ac  d106              BNE      |L1.8892|
0022ae  f1000002          ADD      r0,r0,#2              ;1446
0022b2  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1446
0022b6  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1446
0022ba  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8892|
0022bc  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1447
0022be  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1447
0022c0  d106              BNE      |L1.8912|
0022c2  f1000003          ADD      r0,r0,#3              ;1447
0022c6  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1447
0022ca  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1447
0022ce  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8912|
0022d0  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1448
0022d2  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1448
0022d4  d106              BNE      |L1.8932|
0022d6  f1000004          ADD      r0,r0,#4              ;1448
0022da  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1448
0022de  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1448
0022e2  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8932|
0022e4  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1449
0022e6  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1449
0022e8  d106              BNE      |L1.8952|
0022ea  f1000005          ADD      r0,r0,#5              ;1449
0022ee  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1449
0022f2  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1449
0022f6  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8952|
0022f8  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1450
0022fa  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1450
0022fc  d106              BNE      |L1.8972|
0022fe  f1000006          ADD      r0,r0,#6              ;1450
002302  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1450
002306  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1450
                  |L1.8970|
00230a  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.8972|
00230c  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1451
00230e  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1451
002310  d1fb              BNE      |L1.8970|
002312  f1000007          ADD      r0,r0,#7              ;1451
002316  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1451
00231a  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1451
00231e  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1453   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1455   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1456   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
002320  4b6e              LDR      r3,|L1.9436|
;;;1457   {
;;;1458   ind_pointer--;
002322  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002324  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
002328  b212              SXTH     r2,r2
00232a  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
;;;1459   if(ind_pointer<=0)ind_pointer=0;
00232c  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
00232e  dc02              BGT      |L1.9014|
002330  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002334  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
                  |L1.9014|
;;;1460   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
002336  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
002338  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
00233a  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
00233c  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1461   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
00233e  4a68              LDR      r2,|L1.9440|
002340  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
002344  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
002346  4864              LDR      r0,|L1.9432|
002348  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
00234a  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
00234c  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
00234e  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1462   
;;;1463   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
002350  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
002352  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
002354  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1464   }
002356  4770              BX       lr
;;;1465   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1466   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1467   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
002358  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1468   {
;;;1469   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;

002372  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]

002376  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1470   ind=(i_enum)tind;

;;;1471   sub_ind=tsub_ind;

;;;1472   index_set=tindex_set;
00237c  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1473   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;

;;;1474   }
002380  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1475   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1518   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1519   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
0023ee  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1520   {
0023f0  9c03              LDR      r4,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1521   //bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
;;;1522   //tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
;;;1523   //ret((char)(m_sec/100));
;;;1524   show_mess_cnt=(char)(m_sec/100);

;;;1529   }

;;;1530   //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

;;;1531   void show_mess_number(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec,short number, char komma)

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1557   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1558   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
